guest_info.name: Kelly Carlson
guest_info.title: Award Winning Broker
guest_info.company: At Properties, Christie's International Real Estate
guest_info.specialty: Interior design, historical homes, DIY updates

main_topics: Transition from consulting to real estate
Building a real estate business in your 20s
Effective use of social media for real estate
Navigating a slower real estate market

problems_addressed.specific_problem: How to build a client base as a new agent
problems_addressed.solution_summary: Leverage open houses and personal connections to build a referral-based business.

problems_addressed.specific_problem: Creating engaging content on social media
problems_addressed.solution_summary: Focus on storytelling and sharing personal renovation projects instead of just listed/sold posts.
Join a brokerage with strong local presence and focus on off-market opportunities.

target_avatars.relevance: New agents can learn how to effectively start their career in real estate.
target_avatars.key_takeaway: Focus on building relationships and providing value to clients through unique services.

target_avatars.relevance: Agents aiming for high production can benefit from Kelly's strategic approach to business growth.
target_avatars.key_takeaway: Leverage personal strengths and market knowledge to differentiate yourself in the industry.

clip_worthy_moments.quote: I offer suburb tours to help clients decide where to live before they even start looking at houses.
clip_worthy_moments.why_clipworthy: It highlights a unique service that adds value and differentiates the agent.
clip_worthy_moments.suggested_hook: Struggling to decide where to live? Here's a unique service that could change the game.

key_tactics.tactic: Offer suburb tours to potential buyers.
key_tactics.context: Help clients decide on a location before house hunting.

key_tactics.tactic: Use CRM to organize and prioritize client interactions.
key_tactics.context: Set reminders for regular follow-ups with different client categories.

quotable_insights: Don't be a secret agent; make sure your sphere knows you're in real estate.
It's not about being on every platform; it's about being where your audience is.

resources_mentioned.name: Real Geeks
resources_mentioned.context: A tool for lead generation and CRM management.

episode_summary: In this episode, Kelly Carlson shares her journey from consulting to becoming a top-producing real estate agent in her 20s. She discusses the importance of leveraging open houses, building a referral-based business, and using social media effectively. Kelly also introduces her unique suburb tours, providing exceptional value to clients by helping them choose the right area before house hunting.
